{static is} The New Dynamic

Following the Post-CMS paradigm

About the Site

I’ve built hundreds of websites over the past dozen years from super simple to the complex. As a long-time user and observer of web publishing technology, and you could say at times a partisan in the CMS wars, I’ve never been as excited as I am about static site generators and the “Post-CMS world”. Why?

Copy goes here.

Details of the site.

This site is built with Jekyll with my own theme coded by hand in Sublime Text and is published to an AWS S3 bucket, using @laurilehmijoki’s excellent S3_website gem and Travis Continuous Integration Service to push my builds from Github to S3.
